title: Handling Regret: How do we handle regret so it doesn't control our lives?
description:
Regret is one of the most inevitable — and human — emotions. Chelsea and Judah address their own regrets and share tangible practices for handling regret and forgiving yourself.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
